recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.notes: Rich and hearty Italian-style meat sauce served with pasta.

content.content: In a pan, sauté garlic in olive oil.
Add ground beef and cook until brown.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
Mix with spaghetti and serve hot.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast Deluxe
recipes.notes: A healthy breakfast option with creamy avocado and egg.

content.content: Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.
Top with fried egg and serve warm.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.notes: Perfect post-workout meal packed with lean protein.

content.content: Toss all ingredients with olive oil and lemon juice.

recipes.name: Keto Cheese Omelette
recipes.notes: Low-carb breakfast suitable for Keto followers.

content.content: Pour eggs, sprinkle cheese, and fold omelette.

recipes.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.notes: Balanced vegan bowl with grains, veggies, and plant protein.

recipes.name: Overnight Oats with Berries
recipes.notes: No-cook breakfast option for busy mornings.

content.content: Combine oats, milk, and chia seeds in a jar.
Top with berries and honey before serving.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Salmon Bowl
recipes.notes: Japanese-inspired salmon rice bowl with veggies.

content.content: Serve over rice with steamed broccoli.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.notes: Simple layered yogurt dessert or snack.

recipes.name: Protein Pancakes
recipes.notes: Fluffy pancakes rich in protein – great for athletes.

content.content: Serve with fruit or nut butter.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.notes: Classic Caesar salad with a creamy dressing.

recipes.notes: Spicy Mexican-style chili with beans and ground beef.

content.content: Add beans, tomato sauce, and spices.

recipes.name: Shrimp Stir-Fry
recipes.notes: Quick and colorful Asian-style stir fry.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.notes: Creamy Italian rice dish with mushrooms and parmesan.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.notes: Tasty street-style tacos with seasoned beef.

content.content: Fill shells with meat and toppings.

plans.name: Keto Diet Plan
plans.notes: Low-carb, high-fat diet to trigger ketosis and promote fat burning.

plans.name: Mediterranean Diet Plan
plans.notes: Heart-healthy diet inspired by Mediterranean coastal cuisine.

detail.content: whole grains, olive oil, and vegetables

plans.name: Vegan Clean Eating Plan
plans.notes: Whole-food, plant-based approach focused on natural ingredients.

detail.content: grains and legumes for complete proteins

plans.name: Paleo Diet Challenge
plans.notes: Inspired by ancestral eating habits – unprocessed and nutrient-dense.

detail.content: lean meats, fish, fruits, vegetables, nuts, and seeds

plans.name: Intermittent Fasting 16:8
plans.notes: Timed eating pattern focusing on fasting and feeding windows.
plans.goal: Reduce body fat and improve insulin sensitivity

plans.name: DASH Diet Program
plans.notes: Designed to prevent hypertension through balanced nutrition.
plans.goal: Lower blood pressure and improve heart health

plans.name: Low-Carb Balanced Diet
plans.notes: Moderate-carb diet focused on stabilizing blood sugar levels.
plans.goal: Control appetite and maintain steady energy

detail.content: lean meats, fish, eggs, and leafy greens

plans.name: HIIT Fat Burner
plans.notes: High-Intensity Interval Training for maximum fat burn in short sessions.

plans.name: Push-Pull Strength Plan
plans.notes: Classic split routine alternating push and pull exercises for muscle building.

detail.content: Bench press, Shoulder press, Tricep dips

plans.name: Yoga Flexibility Program
plans.notes: Focus on improving flexibility, posture, and relaxation.

plans.name: Cardio Endurance Plan
plans.notes: Structured plan to improve stamina and cardiovascular health.

plans.name: CrossFit Challenge
plans.notes: High-intensity functional movements for strength and conditioning.

detail.content: 15 min AMRAP (as many rounds as possible)

plans.notes: No equipment required, perfect for beginners at home.
